content.question: Which of the following best explains a process occurring between point 1 and point 2 in Figure 3 ?

choices.label: <math alttext="alpha M S H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>α</mi><mo lspace="0em" rspace="0em">–</mo><mtext>MSH</mtext></mrow></math> is produced.
The <math alttext="T Y R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="italic"><mrow><mtext>TYR</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> gene is transcribed.
Polypeptides are removed from a protein.
A poly‑A tail is added to <math alttext="R N A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>RNA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

content.answer: A poly‑A tail is added to <math alttext="R N A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>RNA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

skill.text: 2.B: Explain relationships between characteristics of biological models in both theoretical and applied contexts.
